duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nursing care for medical-surgical patients in accordance with established policies and procedures.
Assess patient's medical status and respond to any changes in condition.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to develop and implement patient care plans.
Administer medications and treatments as prescribed by attending physician.
Educate patients and their families about treatment plans and post-discharge care.
Monitor and document patient progress and update medical records.
Adhere to safety and infection control protocols.

education_certification.credential: Associate or Bachelor's degree in Nursing (RN)
